article: 3 Quick Steps to Turn Off Instagram's Vanish Mode Feature
intro: Instagram's Vanishing Mode is a temporary feature that allows you to send messages that disappear once it's turned off or leaves the chat. This works in all private chats and direct messages. While you can't turn off this mode permanently, you can easily exit it if it's active. Here's how to turn off Vanish Mode on Instagram using your iPhone, iPad, or Android.
